name: Mami form Madoka, But in Unreal 5
name_original: Mami form Madoka, But in Unreal 5
description:
[Project Mami]

An experimental prototype of moving everyone's favorite scene in Magica Madoka into Unreal 5.

[Control]

WASD to move, SPACE to jump.
